Text: #G02# As a UI designer, I want to redesign the Resources page, so that it matches the new Broker design styles.
#G02# As a UI designer, I want to report to the Agencies about user testing, so that they are aware of their contributions to making Broker a better UX.
Action: Report To The Agencies About User Testing

Text: #G02# As a UI designer, I want to move on to round 2 of DABS or FABS landing page edits, so that I can get approvals from leadership.
Action: Round 2 Of Dabs Landing Page Edits

Text: #G02# As a UI designer, I want to move on to round 2 of Homepage edits, so that I can get approvals from leadership.
#G02# As a UI designer, I want to move on to round 3 of the Help page edits, so that I can get approvals from leadership.
Action: Round 3 Of The Help Page Edits

Text: #G02# As a Developer, I want to add the updates on a FABS submission to be modified when the publishStatus changes, so that I know when the status of the submission has changed.
Action: Add The Updates On A Fabs Submission To Modified

Text: #G02# As a Broker user, I want to Upload and Validate the error message to have accurate text.
#G02# As a Website user, I want to access published FABS files, so that I can see the new files as they come in.
#G02# As an owner, I want to be sure that USAspending only send grant records to my system.
#G02# As a Developer, I want to update the Broker validation rule table to account for the rule updates in DB-2213.
Action: Update The Broker Validation Rule Table

Text: #G02# As a Developer, I want to add the GTAS window data to the database, so that I can ensure the site is locked down during the GTAS submission period.
Action: Add The Gtas Window Data To The Database

Text: #G02# As a user, I want to access the raw agency published files from FABS via USAspending.
#G02# As an Agency user, I want to be able to include a large number of flexfields without performance impact.
Action: Include A Large Number Of Flexfields Without Performance Impact

Text: #G02# As a Broker user, I want  to help create content mockups, so that I can submit my data efficiently.
#G02# As a UI designer, I want to track the issues that come up in Tech Thursday, so that I know what to test and what want s to be fixed.
Action: Track The Issues Thursday Come Up In Tech

Text: #G02# As an Owner, I want to create a user testing summary from the UI SME, so that I can know what UI improvements we will follow through on.
Action: Create A User Testing Summary From The Ui Sme

Text: #G02# As a UI designer, I want to begin user testing, so that I can validate stakeholder UI improvement requests.
#G02# As a UI designer, I want to schedule user testing, so that I can give the testers advanced notice to ensure buy-in.
#G02# As an Owner, I want to design a schedule from the UI SME, so that I know the potential timeline of the UI improvements wanted.
Action: Design A Schedule From The Ui Sme

Text: #G02# As an Owner, I want to design an audit from the UI SME, so that I know the potential scope of the UI improvements want ed.
Action: Design An Audit From The Ui Sme

Text: #G02# As a Developer, I want to prevent users from double publishing FABS submissions after refreshing, so that there are no duplicates.
Action: Prevent Users From Publishing Double After Refreshing

Text: #G02# As an data user, I want to receive updates to FABS records.
#G02# As a Developer , I want to update the FABS sample file to remove FundingAgencyCode after FABS is updated to no longer require the header.
#G02# As an agency user, I want to ensure that deleted FSRS records are not included in submissions.
#G02# As a website user, I want to see updated financial assistance data daily.
#G02# As a Developer , I want to ensure that attempts to correct or delete non-existent records don't create new published data.
#G02# As an Owner, I want to reset the environment to only take Staging MAX permissions, so that I can ensure that the FABS testers no longer have access.
#G02# As a user, I want to have accurate and complete data related to PPoPCode and PPoPCongressionalDistrict.
#G02# As a Developer , I want to clarify to users what exactly is triggering the CFDA error code in each case.
#G02# As a broker team member, I want to make some updates to the SQL codes for clarity.
Action: Make To The Sql Codes For Clarity

Text: #G02# As an agency user, I want to have all derived data elements derived properly.
#G02# As a data user, I want to see the office names derived from office codes, so that I can have appropriate context for understanding them.
Action: See The Office Names From Office Codes

Text: #G02# As a broker team member, I want to ensure the Broker resources, validations, and P&P pages are updated appropriately for the launch of FABS and DAIMS v1.1.
#G02# As a broker team member, I want to derive FundingAgencyCode, so that the data quality and completeness improves.
#G02# As an agency user, I want to use the schema v1.1 headers in my FABS file.
Action: Use The Schema V1.1 Headers In Fabs File

Text: #G02# As a agency user, I want to map the FederalActionObligation properly to the Atom Feed.
Action: Map The Federalactionobligation To The Atom Feed

Text: #G02# As a Broker user, I want to have PPoPZIP+4 work the same as the Legal Entity ZIP validations.
#G02# As a FABS user, I want to link the SAMPLE FILE on the "What you want  to submit" dialog to point to the correct file, so that I have an accurate reference for my agency submissions.
Action: Link The Sample File On The Want

Text: #G02# As a Developer , I want to determine how agencies will generate and validate D Files from FABS and FPDS data.
#G02# As a user, I want to generate and validate D Files from FABS and FPDS data.
Action: Generate D Files From Fabs Fpds Data
Validate D Files From Fabs Fpds Data

Text: #G02# As an Agency user, I want to receive a more helpful file-level error when I upload a file with the wrong extension.
Action: Receive A More Helpful File Level Error
Upload A File With The Wrong Extension

Text: #G02# As a tester, I want to have access to test features in environments other than Staging, so that I can test any nonProd feature in any environment.
Action: Have Access To Test Features In Other Environments Staging

Text: #G02# As a FABS user, I want to submission errors to accurately represent FABS errors, so that I know why my submission didn't work.
#G02# As an Agency user, I want to accurately see who created a submission, so that I'm not confused about who last updated a submission.
#G02# As an Agency user, I want to better understand my file-level errors.
#G02# As a Developer , I want to provide FABS groups that function under the FREC paradigm.
Action: Provide Fabs Groups Function Under The Frec Paradigm

Text: #G02# As a tester, I want to ensure that FABS is deriving fields properly through a robust test file plus a follow up check.
#G02# As a Broker user, I want to submit records for individual recipients without receiving a DUNS error.
Action: Submit Records For Individual Recipients Receiving A Duns Error

Text: #G02# As a Developer, I want to prevent duplicate transactions from being published and deal with the time gap between validation and the publishing decision.
Action: Deal With The Gap Between The Publishing Decision
Deal With The Time Gap Between Validation

Text: #G02# As a FABS user, I want to submit a citywide as a PPoPZIP and pass validations.
Action: Submit A Citywide As A Ppopzip

Text: #G02# As a Broker user, I want to have updated error codes that accurately reflect the logic and provide enough information, so that I can fix my submission.
Action: Have Updated Error Codes Accurately Reflect The Logic

Text: #G02# As an agency user, I want to leave off the last 4 digits of the ZIP without an error, so that I can complete my submissions.
Action: Leave Off The Last Digits Of The Zip Without An Error

Text: #G02# As a FABS user, I want to make sure the historical data includes all necessary columns, so that the information in the database is correct.
#G02# As a data user, I want to access two additional fields from the FPDS data pull.
Action: Access Additional Fields From The Fpds Data Pull

Text: #G02# As a FABS user, I want to download the uploaded FABS file, so that I can get the uploaded file.
#G02# As a Developer I want to quickly access Broker application data, so that I can investigate issues.
#G02# As a FABS user, I want to have read-only access to DABS, so that I can view DABS pages without wanting two sets of permissions.
#G02# As a FABS user, I want to have my validations run in a reasonable amount of time.
#G02# As a FABS user, I want to see correct status labels on the Submission Dashboard, so that I can quickly see my submission history.
Action: See Correct Status Labels On The Submission Dashboard

Text: #G02# As an agency user, I want to submit my data elements surrounded by quotation marks, so that Excel won't strip off leading and trailing zeroes.
